name: strong
description: Bullet Protective Screens are the Most Durable Screens on the market. Protect your players and coaches with the most reliable softball screen on the market, the Bullet 8x4 Softball Screen. We have been Installing Sports Facilities for over 20+ years and know firsthand the abuse a screen receives year-round. The durable design of the Bullet 8x4 Softball Screen is ideal for high volume, and high-velocity training facilities. The Bullet 8x4 Softball Screen comes fully equipped with an overhead protector, 1 ⅝” industrial-grade galvanized steel frame, and #60 gauge nylon double-layered pillowcase netting. Built to withstand the constant abuse of a commercial training facility, high school, college, or organization, these screens are truly built to last. Match your team’s colors, reduce batted ball ricochet, and protect the life of your netting with heavy-duty foam and vinyl padding. Also, if you are needing a screen that is easy to move around, be sure to add our wheel kit that is perfect for both on and off the field. Order your Bullet Softball Screen today with FREE & FAST DELIVERY . Bullet Protective Screens are the Most Durable Screens on the market. category_path: Bullet Fastpitch Softball Screen w/ Overhead Protector (8'x4')
features: Frame Warranty: Full Five (5) Year Warranty
Netting Warranty: Full Two (2) Year Warranty
Pro Grade: 8’H x 4’W L Frame with Overhead Protector
Frame: Durable & Rust Resistant 14 Gauge Galvanized Steel Frame
Netting: Long-Lasting #60 UV Treated Nylon, Double Layer Pillowcase Net
Heavy Duty: 18 oz Vinyl & 1 ½” Impact Foam Padding
Optional Wheel Kit: 10” with Steel Plate Cover
Perfect for: Right & Left-Handed Live Batting Practice & Front Toss
All-Weather Materials: Provides Protection from Outdoor Elements
Built Tough: For Training Facilities, Schools, & Organizations
Shipping Dimensions: Screen Box: 82”H x 16”W x 4”L (45 lbs) Pad Kit Box (Optional Wheels): 48”H x 12”W x 12” (10-25 lbs)
Pad Kit Box (Optional Wheels): 48”H x 12”W x 12” (10-25 lbs)
